Text:
Great film, very watchable quality but NO SUB TITLES IN ENGLISH? Although it says it has them? just spoken language in THai/Japanese?

If there are subs in engligh they dont show on my d.load?

this is the subtitle file >> Ong Bak[2003]DvDrip[thai+eng subs]-KUNJU.srt
rename it to >> Ong Bak[2003]DvDrip[thai+eng_subs]-KUNJU.srt
so that it will have the same filename as "Ong Bak[2003]DvDrip[thai+eng_subs]-KUNJU.avi"
